usecase.commu

Interface ChatManage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChatManager

    public interface ChatManage
extends java.io.Serializable
    ChatManage manages all chats, including DirectChat (two people directly talk to each other), Announcement (a group of people can view, and only some can add message).

      • getDirectChat

        Chat getDirectChat(java.util.UUID p1,
                   java.util.UUID p2,
                   java.util.function.Function<java.util.UUID,java.lang.String> nameMap)
        Create a direct chat for p1 and p2. If the chat already exist, return it.
        Parameters:
        p1 - a person.
        p2 - a person.
        nameMap - a function that returns a person's name.
        Returns:
        a direct chat.

      • createAnnouncement

        void createAnnouncement(Event event,
                        java.util.function.Function<Event,java.lang.String> nameMap)
        Create a announcement for that event. If the announcement already exist, throws an SocialException.
        Parameters:
        event - the event.
        nameMap - a function that returns the name of the event.
        Throws:
        SocialException - if the announcement already exist.

        person - a person.
        level - the initial level.
